backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing products, offers, enquiries, contact info, and user profiles with access‑controlled admin/user operations and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router for public and admin routes with separate layouts and automatic router switching based on URL.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown to non-admin users with logout and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard enforcing Internet Identity authentication and admin status, showing loaders or access-denied UI as needed.
frontend/src/components/enquiry/EnquiryD: Modal dialog for submitting product enquiries with form fields, success message, and async submission handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info, contact details, quick links, and WhatsApp integration.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with brand title, desktop and mobile navigation, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/offers/OfferBann: Auto-rotating banner slider displaying offer images or fallback banners with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product card with image, price, badges, metadata, and options to order via WhatsApp or open an enquiry dialog.
Filter sidebar allowing users to sort, filter by attributes, and adjust price range based on available products.
frontend/src/components/ScrollReveal.tsx: React component that animates children into view using IntersectionObserver for fade-and-slide reveal effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin using the actor’s isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via AuthClient in a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls into React Query hooks for products, offers, contact info, and enquiry submission.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and luxury-themed color variables, gradients, components, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin home page providing navigation to product, offers, contact, and enquiries management sections.
Handles Internet Identity login flow for admins and redirects authenticated admins to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContactAdminPag: Placeholder page for managing business contact information.
frontend/src/pages/admin/EnquiriesAdminP: Placeholder page for viewing and managing customer enquiries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OffersAdminPage: Placeholder page for administering promotional offers and banners.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ProductsAdminPa: Placeholder page for managing products in the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/CollectionPage.tsx: Displays the product collection with filters, loading states, and animated product cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact details and a form that submits enquiries using backend queries, with loading and success handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying hero banner, features, and sections for new and featured products fetched from the API.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Loads current offers and discounted products, showing a banner slider and a grid of sale items.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays full product details with image gallery, size selection, tailoring notes, and WhatsApp ordering.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting dates, relative dates, and AED prices.
frontend/src/utils/productFiltering.ts: Implements product filtering and sorting plus helpers for extracting available sizes and colors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash routes), storing them in sessionStorage, retrieving them, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp message links and predefined product/general inquiry messages for ordering abayas.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the boutique website’s purpose, design notes, features, and required images.
